Articles.Content:
High, I've reinstalled KSP (wanted a clean game) but the tool bar in the top right hand corner is missing. Well...perhaps there's a setting or button I'm meant to press, but I cannot find such a thing. Tried searching for help, but all I can find is stuff to do with the debug toolbar or the toolbar plug in. I'm just wanting the corner toolbar thingy! Hope you can help, thanks!

Version is 0.25, installed it today. no errors, nothing to screenshot.
Hm, alright, that's a bit odd. Can you upload a log file as per the instructions in the stickied thread, please?

And maybe a picture. (See here...)

Sometimes having funny graphics settings can cause things to disappear. I sort of recall a mod causing an issue like this too, but I can't recall which off hand. Confirm you aren't using any mods?

Cheers,

Claw
